prompt:
Nurse: That's great, Mr. Weeks. Have you gained more than 2 pounds in the past day or 5 pounds in the past week?

Patient: No.

Nurse: That's good to hear, Mr. Weeks. Lastly, have you been using more pillows at night to sleep?

Patient: No.

Nurse: That's great, Mr. Weeks. We just performed a simple CHF assessment. It's a good idea to keep an eye on these symptoms at home every day. I understand that keeping track of symptoms can be complicated. Do you have any questions about how to do so?

Patient: No.

Nurse: I apologize for the confusion earlier, Mr. Weeks. Could you please confirm if you've been using more pillows at night to sleep?

Patient: I said no.

responses.gpt4: My apologies, Mr. Weeks. There was a miscommunication. Thank you for your patience. Your doctor, Doctor Stapleton, will review your responses and you will get a call from a nurse if there are any further questions or necessary steps. Is there anything else you want to discuss today?
responses.our_model: I appreciate you letting me know. Give me a moment to check how I can best help you. I appreciate you letting me know. Give me a moment to check how I can best help you. Thank you for confirming that, Mr. Weeks. Now, let's talk about your diet. Can you tell me about some of the meals you've had recently?
